translation.en: - ♪ Chico ♪ - ♪ Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.fr: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon ♪
translation.fr: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
- I saw a m- m- monkey! - Tool belt!
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.fr: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
Monkey with a tool belt!
Chico Bon Bon and the Ice Cream Monster!
translation.fr: Chico Bon Bon et le monstre voleur de glaces !

translation.en: I scream, you scream, we all scream for…
translation.fr: Des glaces, des glaces, on adore…

translation.en: Ice cream?
Chico, I love that you've re- engineered my Fridgey Boo Boo
translation.fr: Chico, merci d'avoir arrangé mon Fridgi-Trop Chou

translation.en: to make ice cream,
but it keeps coming out melty.
translation.fr: mais elle est toujours fondue en sortant.

translation.en: Oh, I think I see the problem, Mrs. Coleslaw.
translation.fr: Je vois d'où vient le problème.

translation.en: There must be something wrong with Fridgey's insulation.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir un souci d'isolant.

translation.en: Oh dear! His what, now?
translation.fr: Oh, non ! Il se sent seul ?

translation.en: Insulation. Check it out. Fridgey Boo Boo's got a freezing machine to make ice cream,
translation.fr: Non, de l'isolant. Fridgi-Trop Chou a une machine qui fait des glaces,

translation.en: and this foam material is insulation.
translation.fr: et la mousse, c'est de l'isolant.

translation.en: It's what keeps the ice cream cold once it's made. The foam insulation makes it hard for heat to get in.
translation.fr: C'est ça qui garde la glace au frais. La mousse empêche la chaleur d'entrer.

translation.en: That's why Fridgey can keep things cold.
translation.fr: C'est comme ça que ça reste froid.

translation.en: Looks like Fridgey Boo Boo doesn't have enough insulation.
That's why the ice cream comes out melty.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que la glace fond.

translation.en: Oh no! What do we do, Chico?
Don't worry. I'll just add some more foam for better insulation.
translation.fr: Tout va bien. Je vais rajouter de la mousse.

translation.en: There. Now you've got the perfect ice cream making machine.
translation.fr: Voilà. Maintenant, ce sera parfait pour faire des glaces.

translation.en: Go on, give it a try.
Well, all right.
Nice and cold, just the way I like it.
translation.fr: Elle est bien fraîche comme je l'aime.

translation.en: Woo- hoo! Yay! Insulation!
Thank you, Chico.
And thank you, Fridgey Boo Boo.
The banana phone! Chico Bon Bon! You got a problem? We can solve 'em!
translation.fr: Le banane-phone. Chico Bon Bon ! Un problème ? On vous dépanne.

translation.en: Freddy and Betty Lemuretti here.
Has this ever happened to you?
You're enjoying a delicious ice cream treat
when a giant monster grabs it right out of your hand?
translation.fr: et un monstre géant vous l'arrache des mains ?

translation.en: No, that's never happened to us.
translation.fr: Ça ne nous est jamais arrivé.

translation.en: Actually, it has happened to us.
Us too!
More ice cream!
That monster ate all of our ice cream!
translation.fr: Ce monstre a mangé toute la glace !

translation.en: And she's still hungry!
More ice cream!
Say no more. We're on our way!
Fix- It Force, we need to feed that monster fast,
or she'll destroy Blunderburg looking for more ice cream.
It's time to bring the ice cold awesome!
translation.fr: Ça va être génial et bien frais !

translation.en: Chico Bon Bon!
Rainbow Thunder!
Clark!
Tiny!
I'm Neil Ostrich here on the scene.
Literally, on the scene.
There's a monster on the loose in Blunderburg and it's hungry for one thing:
translation.fr: Il y a un monstre à Bémol Ville qui veut une seule chose :

translation.en: ice cream!
I don't-- Whoa!
More ice cream!
Cones, sundaes, novelty treats…
No form of ice cream is safe!
Who can save the city from that ice- cream- craving creature?
translation.fr: Qui sauvera la ville de ce monstre fan de glaces ?

translation.en: More ice cream!
I'm Chico Bon Bon, monkey with a tool belt!
translation.fr: Je suis Chico Bon Bon, le petit singe bricoleur.

translation.en: And we're the Fix- It Force!
And that's one big monster!
translation.fr: Et ce monstre est très gros !

translation.en: Which means we need a monster- sized serving of ice cream to fill her tummy, so she'll never come after our ice cream again.
translation.fr: Donc il faut une glace à sa taille pour qu'elle ne prenne plus la nôtre.

translation.en: But Betty and I will never be able to make enough!
translation.fr: Mais on n'en fera jamais assez !

translation.en: Then what we need is all the ice cream left in Blunderburg.
translation.fr: Il nous faut toute la glace qu'il reste dans la ville.

translation.en: Operation Ice Cream begins now!
Our tastiest mission yet!
As the Ice Cream Monster continues her rampage,
translation.fr: Le monstre de glace saccage tout,

translation.en: Mayor Murphy has declared a level- five ice cream emergency!
translation.fr: Mme le maire Murphy a déclaré l'état d'urgence glacé !

translation.en: Citizens of Blunderburg, the Fix- It Force needs your ice cream!
translation.fr: Citoyens de Bémol Ville, la Section Répar'Tout a besoin de vos glaces !

translation.en: Thanks, Mayor!
- All right! - So much ice cream!
Our bowl is full!
Then it's time to feed the monster!
More ice cream!
- Quick! Release the ice cream! - Uh, Chico, I think we're too late.
translation.fr: Lâchez la glace ! C'est trop tard, Chico.

translation.en: What do you mean?
The ice cream's all melted!
No melty ice cream!
Okay, so she really doesn't like melty ice cream.
translation.fr: Bon, elle n'aime vraiment pas la glace fondue.

translation.en: We've gotta figure out a way to keep the ice cream cold long enough to feed that monster.
translation.fr: Il faut la garder froide assez longtemps pour nourrir le monstre.

translation.en: Yeah, like with a freezer!
But it would need to be a monster- sized freezer.
A monster- sized freezer!
That's a great idea, Clark!
Rainbow, set a course to Mrs. Coleslaw's house.
Chico, are you sure you wanna do this?
Remember what happened the last time Fridgey Boo Boo transformed into Fridgebot?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de quand Fridgi-Trop Chou est devenu Frigo-Bot ?

translation.en: Oh, I remember!
He went through town shooting ice cubes at everything!
translation.fr: Il a lancé des glaçons dans toute la ville.

translation.en: I know, but he's our only hope.
translation.fr: Oui, mais c'est notre seul espoir.

translation.en: Now presenting…
Fridgebot 2.0, the perfect ice cream delivery machine.
translation.fr: Frigo-Bot 2.0 ! La machine à glace parfaite.

translation.en: Now with ice cream blasting power!
Too melty!
Oh! It just needs a little more insulation to keep all that ice cream cold.
translation.fr: Il faut plus d'isolant pour toute cette glace.

translation.en: And… we're good to go!
I even loaded up some new ice cream jokes.
translation.fr: J'ai téléchargé des blagues de glace.

translation.en: Why do ice cream cones carry umbrellas? Why?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi les glaces ont des ombrelles ? - Dis-nous.

translation.en: Because there's always a chance of sprinkles!
translation.fr: Pour ne pas fondre au soleil.

translation.en: More ice cream!
The Ice Cream Monster, she's coming this way!
We've gotta feed her, fast!
Let's go, Fridgebot!
Bye- bye, Fridgey! Have fun, now.
I'm reporting live from downtown Blunderburg,
where the hungry Ice Cream Monster is still searching for ice cr-- Whoa!
translation.fr: le monstre affamé cherche encore de la glace…

translation.en: Nom? Ice cream?
More ice cream!
Hey, Ice Cream Monster!
Okay, Fridgebot, do your thing! Ice cream blasters, go!
translation.fr: Frigo-Bot, fais ta spécialité ! Pistolets à glace !

translation.en: Activate booster cannons!
How's about a little strawberry and some chocolate chip!
translation.fr: Un peu de fraise et de chocolat ?

translation.en: Ooh! Don't forget peanut butter!
And rainbow sprinkles!
I think it's working!
More ice cream!
What?
She still wants more?
I don't think she'll stop until she's totally full,
translation.fr: Elle s'arrêtera quand elle n'aura plus faim,

translation.en: and even Fridgebot can't feed her fast enough!
translation.fr: Frigo-Bot ne va pas assez vite.

translation.en: You're right, Rainbow.
We need to make her a super- sized bowl of ice cream so she can really chow down.
translation.fr: Il faut un gros bol pour qu'elle se remplisse le ventre.

translation.en: But where are we gonna find a bowl big enough to serve a giant monster?
translation.fr: Mais où trouver un bol assez grand pour un monstre gigantesque ?

translation.en: Giant bowl… Giant bowl…
The Blunderdome. It's just the right size and shape
translation.fr: L'Arène de BémolVille. Elle fait la bonne taille

translation.en: for the biggest, baddest bowl of ice cream ever!
translation.fr: pour faire le bol de glace le plus génial du monde !

translation.en: Fridgebot, fill it up!
Now, mint!
Now, vanilla!
Now, blunderberry!
And finally… the cherry on top.
translation.fr: Et la cerise sur le gâteau.

translation.en: Whoa- ho- ho! That ought to be enough for the monster!
Uh… guys! The ice cream is already melting! We gotta keep it cold!
translation.fr: La glace fond déjà ! Il faut qu'elle reste froide !

translation.en: We spent all this time collecting the ice cream and now it's going to melt!
translation.fr: On a mis du temps à trouver la glace, elle fond.

translation.en: We have to figure out how to keep the Blunderdome cold enough to keep it from melting. What if it doesn't work?
translation.fr: Il faut que l'Arène de BémolVille soit assez fraîche. Sinon…

translation.en: Chico? Maybe now's a good time for a banana break.
translation.fr: Chico ? C'est l'heure d'une petite pause banane.

translation.en: Okay, the monster wants ice cream,
translation.fr: Bon, le monstre veut de la glace,

translation.en: - but we can't keep the ice cream cold. -
Fridgey Boo Boo can only keep it cold when it's inside him. - Outside, it melts! -
translation.fr: Fridgi-Trop Chou la garde au frais. À l'extérieur, ça fond.

translation.en: Because there's no insulation.
Insulation!
Blazing bananas, that's it! We need insulation.
translation.fr: Nom d'une banane ! Il nous faut de l'isolant.

translation.en: Oh yeah!
If we insulate the entire Blunderdome, we can keep the ice cream cold.
translation.fr: Si l'Arène est bien isolée, la glace restera froide.

translation.en: Great idea!
Rainbow, activate foam cannon and prepare to insulate.
translation.fr: Arc-en-ciel, prépare le canon à mousse, on va isoler !

translation.en: - Hang on to your whiskers! -
Folks, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
The Fix- It Force are insulating the Blunderdome with foam!
translation.fr: La Section Répar'Tout isole l'Arène avec de la mousse !

translation.en: - We did it! - Yeah!
The ice cream isn't melting!
It's an insulation sensation!
- Whoa! - She is hungry!
All full!
- - She's full!
Bye- bye!
We saved the city, Fridgebot.
translation.fr: On a sauvé la ville, Frigo-Bot.

translation.en: Now there's only one thing left to do…
Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
Mmm! Thanks for the ice cream, Chico.
The Ice Cream Monster's gone for good! Thank you, Chico.
translation.fr: Le monstre de glace est parti. Merci, Chico.

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without Fridgey Boo Boo here.
Oh! I love you, Fridgey Boo Boo!
What is ice cream's favorite day of the week?
translation.fr: Quel est le sport préféré de la glace ?

translation.en: What is it?
Sunday! Oh, Fridgey Boo Boo!
translation.fr: - Le patin à glace ! - Oh, Fridgi-Trop Chou !
